skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experienced with modern frameworks like React and Angular. Skilled in creating responsive and interactive user interfaces

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Experienced in server-side programming with Node.js and Express. Knowledgeable in database design using SQLite and Firebase. Familiar with cloud platforms including Google Cloud, and AWS

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: As a passionate UI/UX designer, I bring a blend of creativity and user-centric thinking to every project. My experience spans various aspects of design, including  designations and Figma designs

skills.title: Webflow-Development
skills.description: Proficient in Android app development using Android Studio, Kotlin, and Dart. Experienced in creating responsive and user-friendly mobile applications for the Android platform.
